jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Are you interested in building products which build on top of a massive user base and still shoot for the stars? Do you enjoy iterative software development and quickly building products with the ability to see real time impact of your contribution? Here is an opportunity to work with the Growth Platforms team of the fastest growing startup in the sub-continent with 2 Million+ drivers, 300+ restaurants and 1100x growth in its 18 months. Our team is responsible for building growth tools covering experimentation, discovery, personalisation, and promotions at scale across 20+ products.
jobsJson.description: Are you interested in building products which build on top of a massive user base and still shoot for the stars? Do you enjoy iterative software development and quickly building products with the ability to see real time impact of your contribution? Here is an opportunity to work with the Growth Platforms team of the fastest growing startup in the sub-continent with 2 Million+ drivers, 300+ restaurants and 1100x growth in its 18 months. Our team is responsible for building growth tools covering experimentation, discovery, personalisation, and promotions at scale across 20+ products.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world’s fastest growing mobile app in travel
  • Quickly grasp concepts, problems and implement solutions with guidance
  • Unit test code for robustness, usability and reliability
  • Contribute to the evolution of the technology, product and experience
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross-functional teams in a global environment

• 2+ years of experience in software development and 1+ years of hands-on experience in developing and testing apps on iOS for large scale applications
  • Strong foundations in OOPs, Design Patterns, Clean Code fundamentals
  • Proficiency in Web Technologies and Experience on Rails will be a plus
  • Good understanding of interactive application development paradigm
  • Working experience in Objective-C programming, Cocoa, Xcode,iOS SDK, popular libraries for networking, async, image loading etc.
  • Ability to write high-quality code which is modular, functional, testable and reusable with excellent unit test coverage. Also to understand the dependent system/sub-systems and troubleshoot issues effectively
  • Good understanding of agile methodologies, TDD and test automation, continuous integration and continuous delivery principles and related tool stack
  • Passion to learn new things, solve challenging problems, and have the ability to get stuff done!
  • Willingness to be relocated to Jakarta office (Relocation support will be provided)
